device_list.empty_collection: There are no devices set up yet.

status_indicator.error: An error occurred while activating the measurement device. Please try again.

alert.unknown_error: An error occurred while activating the device.
alert.no_building: Your account is not associated with a building.
alert.already_activated: This measurement device was already activated on another account.

already_invited.title: Already invited
already_invited.description: The invitation email you received contains an activation link. Click on this link to start installing your measuring devices.

status_indicator.error: An error occurred while loading device information. Scan the QR code again.

alert.unknown_error: An error occurred while connecting to the measurement device.
alert.timeout: The device could not be connected. Please restart the app!

authenticated.title: Scan a QR code
authenticated.description: Scan the QR code of a new measurement device. It can be found on the e-ink screen or on a sticker on (the back of) the device.

unauthenticated.title: NeedForHeat
unauthenticated.subtitle: App for participants in a study of Research Group Energy Transition of Windesheim University of Applied Sciences
unauthenticated.description: You can only use this app after receiving an invitation for a study with a personal activation link.

success.title: Device connected successfully
success.message: The measurement device was connected and the research server received data from it on {{date}}.

provisioning_error.title: An error occurred
provisioning_error.message: An error occurred while configuring your device. Restart the measurement device and try again.

wifi_error.title: Something went wrong while connecting the Wi-Fi network
wifi_error.message: Please make sure the password is correct and you are in proximity of the device.

measurements_error.title: No data was received
measurements_error.message: Even after a long wait, no data was received from the device.

errors.invalid_qr: The QR code is not a valid QR code for a measurement device.
errors.mismatched_device_name: The device name in the QR code does not match the name of the device you are trying to reset.
errors.unknown_error: An error occurred while scanning the QR code.

bluetooth.request_failed: An error occurred while requesting Bluetooth permissions.
bluetooth.enable_failed: An error occurred while enabling Bluetooth.

alert.title: Bluetooth permission
alert.message: This app uses Bluetooth, but does not register your location. On Android devices, Bluetooth is considered part of location services. That's why you will get a question about location.

error.title: An error occurred.
error.message: Please make sure Bluetooth is enabled and try again.

not_found.title: Device {{name}} was not found.
not_found.message: Please make sure that the measurement device is near your smartphone. Searching again with the button below.

status_indicator.unexpected_loading: Loading Wi-Fi networks is taking longer than expected, please wait...
status_indicator.error: An error has occurred while loading Wi-Fi networks.

fetch_error.title: Error
fetch_error.message: An error occurred while loading Wi-Fi networks. The connection to the device might have been lost.

known_network.title: Use stored password?
known_network.message: Do you want to use the password stored previously for this network {{name}}?

password.title: Password
password.message: Enter the password for the network

hidden_wifi.title: Error
hidden_wifi.message: Cannot connect to hidden Wi-Fi networks

invalid_wifi.title: Error
invalid_wifi.message: This measurement device can not connect to WPA2 Enterprise or WPA3 networks.

wifi_passwords.title: Delete stored Wi-Fi passwords
wifi_passwords.message: Are you sure? After removing the stored Wi-Fi passwords from this app, you will have to enter the password again when you want to add a new measurement device.

session_token.title: Reset session token
session_token.message: Are you sure? This is a debug feature. After the reset, you need to re-activate the app using a personal invitation link.

bluetooth_permission.not_granted: Bluetooth permission is not granted. Please grant the permission and try again.

external_links.not_supported: Your device does not support opening external links.

confirmation.title: Open external link
confirmation.description:
You are going to open a link outside the application, are you sure?

URL: {{url}}

activate.title: Activating account
activate.message: Please wait while your account is being activated.

manual_content.error: The manual could not be loaded. Contact the device manufacturer for more information or continue at your own risk.
